songs.title: Everything Fades Away
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Baby, don't tell me you miss me, you love me
Don't whisper gently that you can't forget me
Tonight, tonight
'Cause I've heard it all before
Just turn away
Don't play that game
Baby, I don't want you anymore

[Chorus]
Let it all fade away
Don't you know the love is gone
It's too late
Everything fades away
Nothing ever stays the same
Baby, no, no, no

[Verse 2]
Don't tell me
You're sorry you hurt me
How many times can I give in?
How many battles can you win?
Oh, don't beg for mercy
Tonight, tonight
'Cause I can't take any more
Just turn around
Don't break me down
Baby, I don't love you like before

[Chorus]
Let it all fade away
Don't you know the love is gone
It's too late, oh
Everything fades away
Nothing ever stays the same
Baby

[Bridge]
Oh, so hard for me to let you go
Don't leave me standing in the cold
Oh baby, give me one more chance
I know that we can make amends
Just let me love you one more time (Don't say it)
Or I am gonna lose mind (Don't say it, babe)
So hard for me to let you go
So hard for me to let you go

[Chorus]
Let it all (Why don't you?) fade away
Love is gone
The love is gone, baby
It's too late
Everything fades away
Nothing ever stays the same, babe
Nothing ever stays the same
Let it all fade away
Love is gone
The love is gone baby
It's too late
Everything fades away
Nothing ever stays the same, baby

[Outro]
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
Baby, don't tell me you miss me, you love me
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
Baby, don't tell me you miss me, you love me
Baby, don't tell me you miss me, you love me
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
It only fades
Baby, don't tell me you miss me, you love me
